About Me

Hello, I am Harsh Sahu

Hi, I'm Harsh Sahu, a 20-year-old aspiring full-stack developer pursuing a BCA degree. I'm passionate about building user-friendly and functional web applications, and I've already worked on exciting projects like a Netflix Clone.

Currently, I'm working on creating a professional portfolio website to showcase my skills and journey. I also have an entrepreneurial spirit, aiming to explore opportunities like becoming a Meesho seller.

Outside of tech, I focus on personal growth with a balanced vegetarian diet and a skincare routine to maintain a healthy lifestyle. I'm driven, eager to learn, and excited about making a mark in the world of technology and beyond!
